nodes.text: A village on the world of Cerea served as the home of the Cerean Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi and his family. It was here that Jedi Master An'ya Kuro came and found the four year old Mundi in 88 BBY.

As a result of the encounter and at the behest of Mundi's father, Kuro took Mundi to the Jedi Temple on Coruscant for training. This village was presumably destroyed in the Clone Wars when Mundi's family was killed during the battle in 21 BBY.
